csw:Record.dc:title: Baltic Sea ice concentration, extent, and classification time series

csw:Record.dct:abstract:
Gridded sea ice concentration, sea ice extent and classification based on the digitized Baltic ice charts produced by the FMI/SMHI ice analysts. It is produced daily in the afternoon, describing the ice situation daily at 14:00 EET. The nominal resolution is about 1km. The temporal coverage is from the beginning of the season 1980-1981 until today.
'''DOI (product) :''' https://doi.org/10.48670/moi-00131
